name: Swooning Over Stans New Ending (Fanmade) - Ford Ending
name_original: Swooning Over Stans New Ending (Fanmade) - Ford Ending
description:
Ever heard of the Gravity Falls dating sim? Did the ending leave you feeling just a little unsatisfied? Us too. 
This is a fanmade extension (Ford route) of the Gravity Falls Swooning Over Stans Dating Sim by TheFlipsideRunes and DifferentDucktectiveWasteland on Tumblr, using the same code, sprites, and backdrops by the original creators. (So all art credit goes to them!) 

Original Ending Guitar Music ("Chasing You Down") by DifferentDucktectiveWasteland. [copyright 2021]
